Package com.distrimind.bouncycastle.cert.jcajce

Class JcaCertStoreBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.distrimind.bouncycastle.cert.jcajce.JcaCertStoreBuilder
public class JcaCertStoreBuilder extends Object
Builder to create a CertStore from certificate and CRL stores.

    • setType

      public JcaCertStoreBuilder setType​(String type)
      Set the type of the CertStore generated. By default it is "Collection".
      Parameters:
      type - type of CertStore passed to CertStore.getInstance().
      Returns:
      the current builder.

      public CertStore build() throws GeneralSecurityException
      Build the CertStore from the current inputs.
      Returns:
      a CertStore.
      Throws:
